vega.uplink.planning

Class ObservationPointingBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingElement
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingBlock
          • vega.uplink.planning.ObservationPointingBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointingBlockInterface

    public class ObservationPointingBlock
extends PointingBlock
    Pointing block that is driven by an Observation event instead of times for start time and end time of the block
